name: usernames
description: Show and manage your username history

options.name: show
options.description: Show the username history of a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the history for, default you

options.name: visibility
options.description: Configure the visibility of your own username history

options.name: setting
options.description: The visibility you want for your username history

choices.name: Public (everyone can see your previous usernames)
Private (no one see your previous usernames)
